arts.ttl: La Liga side confirm plan to sign Barcelona star in January window
arts.sum: Girona director Quique Carcel dropped a major hint over his plan to sign Eric Garcia this month. The Catalan side have been linked with a renewed move for Garcia despite rising transfer in him interest from Serie A. arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Willian to Everton, Kelechi Iheanacho to Leeds United and Emiliano Buendia to River Plate.

arts.ttl: Milan’s Luka Jovic Attracts Interest from Sevilla and Monaco
arts.sum: Milan's Serbian forward Luka Jovic is drawing attention from multiple clubs as the January transfer window heats up. Alongside interest from AS Monaco, Sevilla have emerged as a serious contender for his signature.
